info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-cfm-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions for
     monitoring the Connectivity Fault Management protocol operation in a Network Element.
     Copyright (c) 2016-2017, 2019-2022 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Other Services
**Paths:** 24

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-cfm-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-cfm-oper.yang)

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View Cisco-IOS-XE-cfm-oper structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/Cisco-IOS-XE-cfm-oper.html)

domain-name.description: The name of the Domain corresponding the the MEP

ma-name.description: The name of the MA corresponding the the MEP

time.description: Date and time of the last time stats were cleared

ccm-transmitted.description: The number of CCMs transmitted from the local MEP

ccm-seq-errors.description: The number of CCM sequence number errors detected

ltr-unexpected.description:
The number of unexpected linktrace reply packets
         received at this MEP

lbr-transmitted.description:
The number of loopback reply packets transmitted
         from the local MEP

lbr-seq-errors.description:
The number of loopback reply packets received
         with sequence number errors

lbr-received-ok.description: The number of valid loopback reply packets received

lbr-received-bad.description:
The number of loopback reply packets received
         with corrupted data pattern

time.description: Date and time of the last time stats were cleared

last-cleared.description: Info on when the stats were last cleared

domain.description: Remote maintenance end point domain name

service.description:
Identifies a service associated with the maintenance
         end point

mep-id.description:
Unique ID given to a locally configured maintenance
         end point

level.description:
A unique maintenance level at which the maintenance
         end point is configured

mac-addr.description:
MAC address of remote maintenance
         end point interface

offload.description: Set to true when offload is enabled in configuration

port.description:
Physical interface on which the maintenance
         intermediate point is configured

vlan.description: Remote maintenance end point VLAN ID

vlan-valid.description:
VLAN field valid only when we have VLAN configured on
         maintenance end point

inner-vlan.description: Remote maintenance end point inner VLAN ID

inner-vlan-valid.description:
Inner VLAN field valid only when we have double tagged VLAN
         configured on maintenance end point

svc-inst.description:
Service instance number associated with remote
         maintenance end point

evc-name.description: EVC name associated with the maintenance end point

offload-success.description:
When offload is enabled this will show offload status
         True when continuity check is offloaded to hardware

bd-id.description: Maintenance end point bridge domain id

source-static.description:
Local maintenance intermediate point source
         static or not

manual.description:
Local maintenance intermediate point manually
         configured or auto created

local-mep-id.description:
Unique ID given to a locally configured maintenance
         end point

remote-mep-id.description:
Unique ID given to the remotely configured
         maintenance end point

if-status.description: Remote maintenance end point interface status

rdi.description: Whether RDI(Remote Defect Indication) bit set

up-time.description:
Time elapsed since the last CCM packet received from
         the remote maintenance end point

chassis-id.description: Chassis ID(host name) of remote device which sends CCM packets

bdv-id.description: Maintenance end point bridge domain vlan-id

bd-id.description: Maintenance end point bridge domain id

bdv-id.description: Maintenance end point bridge domain vlan-id

service.description:
Identifies a service associated with the maintenance
         end point

mep-id.description:
Unique ID given to a locally configured maintenance
         end point

level.description:
A unique maintenance level at which the domain and
         the maintenance end point are configured

mac-addr.description:
MAC address of the physical interface on which the
         maintenance end point is configured

offload.description: Set to true when offload is enabled in configuration

vlan-valid.description:
VLAN field valid only when we have VLAN configured on
         maintenance end point

         configured on maintenance end point

         maintenance end point

         True when continuity check is offloaded to hardware
